Question: Satechi CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Satechi

Product: Qi2 Wireless Charging Stands

- 3-in-1 Foldable Qi2 Wireless Charging Stand and 2-in-1 Foldable Qi2 Wireless Charging Stand
- Next-generation Qi2 charging technology
- Charges MagSafe iPhones at up to 15W
- 3-in-1 stand includes 5W Apple Watch charger and 5W wireless charger for AirPods
- 2-in-1 stand has a spot for charging the AirPods
- Vegan leather base, aluminum housing, and soft silicone charging puck
- Fast-charging capabilities for Apple Watch Series 7 and later
- 45W USB-C power adapter for 3-in-1 stand
- Both stands fold down for travel
- 3-in-1 stand priced at $130, 2-in-1 stand at $80
- Launch in the second quarter of 2024
Summary_cn:
Satechi

产品：Qi2无线充电支架

- 3合1可折叠Qi2无线充电支架和2合1可折叠Qi2无线充电支架
- 下一代Qi2充电技术
- 以最高15W的速度为MagSafe iPhone充电
- 3合1支架包括5W Apple Watch充电器和5W无线充电器用于AirPods
- 2合1支架有一个用于充电AirPods的位置
- 人造皮革底座，铝制外壳和柔软的硅胶充电座
- Apple Watch系列7及以上型号快速充电能力
- 3合1支架配备45W USB-C电源适配器
- 两个支架都可折叠方便携带
- 3合1支架售价130美元，2合1支架售价80美元
- 计划在2024年第二季度发布
